Title: Shadow Shaman Alt-Tab Guide by Godlike

ItemTooltips.blink: Works great for surprise initiations and ward trapping.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Great for pushing line-ups, as well as a generally good item for any team.
ItemTooltips.cyclone: Provides plenty of mana regen and makes ward trapping a piece of cake.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Scepter makes your wards hit like a truck (or trucks? lol).
ItemTooltips.refresher: If you manage to get this, the game has been over for the past 30 minutes and your team just wants to have fun and not push for the win.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Arcane Boots provide you with the ability to actually use all of your abilities with little to no worry about being short of mana.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: Another great and cheap pushing item for the team.

AbilityTooltips.shadow_shaman_ether_shock: Amazing nuke; worth noting that it deals 140 damage at level 1!
AbilityTooltips.shadow_shaman_voodoo: Great long disable, perfect for ward trapping heroes as it makes their models smaller and easier to trap in.
AbilityTooltips.shadow_shaman_shackles: 2.5 second disable at level 1? Yes, please! Doesn`t scale particularly great though, so is maxed last.
AbilityTooltips.shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward: Use it to push towers or team fight. Don`t be afraid to use it on a single enemy to trap them in between the wards (by using them right on top of the hero). If you manage to successfully ward trap someone who doesn`t have Phase Boots or a Blink-like ability, it guarantees you a kill in most cases.
